trends: There have been no other sightings in New Hope
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed object in southwestern sky approximately 40 degrees above horizion line.Object was brighter than a star and was alternating in color from bright white to light red to blue green in color.Object would remain motionless for up to twenty minutes,then would move up and down and in a spherical pattern and return to originating point.Object also changed intensity over the one hour and half that i observed it with last 15 minutes becoming dimmer.I was putting my lawnmower away when i first noticed the object,it was unusually bright and the only light in that portion of the sky.Just so you know im retired military,and a former police officer and have never reported anything like this before.
Summary: object changing color from red-blue green-white
